drawer.description: Panel deslizante desde un lado (por defecto derecha), con overlay debajo. Header: título (izquierda) + botón cerrar X ghost (derecha). Body con scroll.

structure.overlay: Capa entre página y panel; usa --drawer-overlay-backdrop; bloquea interacción
structure.header: Título (izq) + close ghost icon button X (der); siempre presente

drawer.closeButton: Ghost icon button: transparent bg, full rounded (9999px), X icon (Lucide X). data-slot="drawer-close".
reviewScenarios: Show drawer open state with overlay + header + body anatomy.
Show close behavior via overlay click and Escape key.
Show body scrolling while header remains structurally intact.
a11yAcceptance: Drawer/dialog role is announced and labeled by title.
Focus is trapped while drawer is open and restored on close.
Escape closes drawer unless flow explicitly blocks it.
Overlay blocks interaction with background content.

fail: Drawer misses required overlay + panel + header/body anatomy.
Close button states are not visibly rendered in review harness.
blocker: Missing semantic token mapping for drawer overlay/close states.
No focus trap or focus return behavior can be guaranteed.
